message.raw:
Fix issue #69.

Runmanager was not updating the default shot output folder upon a change in
the labscript file (including restoring the labscript file at startup), leading
it to sometimes  think that the user had intentionally chosen to not use the
default shot output folder, even though they had made no such choice.

Other issues may remain, but this resolves one of them.
